title: Statement from the President on Health Insurance Reform Efforts in Congress | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 29, 2009

 



Statement from the President on Health Insurance Reform Efforts in Congress




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                       July 29, 2009  Statement from the President on Health Insurance Reform Efforts in Congress "I want to thank the members of both the Senate and House of Representatives for continuing their work on health reform to provide more stability and security for Americans who have insurance, and quality, affordable coverage for those who don’t.   I’m especially grateful that so many members, including some Blue Dogs on the Energy and Commerce Committee, are working so hard to find common ground.  Those efforts are extraordinarily constructive in strengthening this legislation and bringing down its cost."
